activities: Workplace Benefits, LLC is the parent company for Workplace Options and Advantage24 and is engaged in the business of delivering work-life and employee assistance services.  We have service centers in the United Kingdom and Ireland, for which Workplace Options and Advantage24 consultants and counselors provide fail-over, over-flow and after-hours coverage.  As such, we receive personal information that is necessary to provide services to an individual covered employee.  This information typically contains name, address, telephone number, employer names and case-related notes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: DMA Safe Harbor
